TITLE: Episode 44 - Drunk on COVID
DESCRIPTION: This week, Thaddeus and Gary spoke about the shocking death of Zappos visionary Tony Hsieh, the legacy of FCC chair Ajit Pai, Google's AI ethicist purge, and Salesforce's acquisition of Slack.
